LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.WeightFactor.Descripti:
Multiplies weight of infusions. Possible values are 0.0 ~ 2.0.
2.0 only picks one of the highest weights for a quality. 0.0 means everything is possible.
Note: Chances still applies.
LanguageData.Infusion.Settings.ChanceFactor.Descripti:
Multiplies probability of infusions. Possible values are 0.0 ~ 100.0.
With default infusions, 10 would be sufficient to ensure everything will pass. 0.0 will effectively disable new infusions.
